resources.string: \nThe creators of this app are team Sodium.

We have an easy way to save your plays for the competitive games you play with your friends!
 
To get started, click on the ‘plus’ button in the Configurations screen and add your favourite games.
 
When you want to add a game play, press the game from the list and click add new game where you can set the number of players for a game, choose the game difficulty level and your favourite theme, and click on the ‘set’ button to add the score for each player and see the achievement level you earned.
 
When you want to edit a game play, press the game from the list in Game history and edit the score for each player and see the new achievement level you earned.
 
You can also view history, view expecting achievement levels for a game, edit and delete a game configuration.
 
To view how many times you have earned each achievement level, you can look at a graph displaying your achievement statistics.
